title: Interpretation of seeing a horse in a dream Interpretation of dreaming of a raging horse in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a horse in a dream is one of the visions that is often repeated in the dreams of many people, and many people search for the meaning of the interpretation of this vision and what good or evil this vision brings, as seeing a horse in a dream shows a lot of goodness if the horse is obedient, and it can It indicates evil if the horse is unruly and unruly, so I will discuss in detail through this article the different meanings of seeing a horse in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a horse in a dream by Ibn Shaheen The jurisprudential interpretation of dreams says that seeing a horse in a dream has many different connotations, such as if one sees in his dream that he is riding A horse with wings and flying with it in the sky, it means that the person will gain a lot of honor in the world and religion. But if one sees in a dream that he is riding a horse without a bridle or a saddle, it means that this person will marry boys. But if one sees in his dream that he He saw a horse inside his house, it means that that person will get a lot of food, conquer his enemies, and obtain many positions. But if one sees in a dream that he is killing a horse, it means that this person will be blessed by God with a lot of money, power, and pride. But if he dreams If one drinks horse milk, this indicates that this person will obtain a lot of goodness from the Sultan’s money. But if one sees in his dream that he is riding a horse, this means that he will marry a woman with large offspring and honor, but if the girl sees that he is riding a strong horse This means that he will marry a rich man. Man.Interpretation of riding in a dreamDream interpreters say that if one sees in a dream that he is riding a horse and is able to ride it, this means that he will obtain many good things and that he will gain great respect and respect among people.But if one sees in his dream that he is riding a gray and strong horse , it means that he will get married soon. If he is single, he will lower his status and resign from his position. But if one sees in a dream that he has a horse in his house, but that horse died, it means that something bad will happen in that person’s life, but if one sees that He has a large collection of horses, so this indicates that this person will get a lot of money and a lot of goodness. Interpretation of seeing an angry and reckless horse in a dreamInterpretations of a dream about a raging horse, because this vision is one of the recurring dreams that many people see in their dreams and the dreamer feels fear during his dream out of fear Than the horse will touch him badly and wake up afraid and anxious about it. The meaning of this dream: We present to you the most important things that have been said in the interpretation of these visions and dreams, so follow us. Dream interpretation scholars say that if a person sees in a dream that he has a reckless horse and cannot approach it, this means that this person is characterized by extreme madness and recklessness and that this person commits many actions. Which is characterized by insanity and lack of thinking and awareness. But if someone sees that he has a strong horse and jumps with him in different races, this indicates that this person will achieve more victories and

title: Interpretation of seeing a dead person alive in a dream?

preview.html: And he was very tired, so this is an indication of the bad condition that the dead person is in, and the dreamer must offer many supplications and alms to this dead person in his life, and God is Most High and Most Knowing, and here are more interpretations through the interpreter’s website, so please follow us. Interpretation of seeing the dead person alive in a dream for a girl Alone: ​​If an unmarried woman sees in a dream that the deceased is alive and feels sorry for her in the dream. The unmarried woman who dreams should pray for him and give alms for his soul from time to time during this period, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. As for the unmarried girl who sees that the deceased is He was alive and was very happy in the dream. It indicates the good state he was in in the house of the Most High, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When he saw that the dead person was alive sitting and eating with unmarried women in the dream, he was happy. Here it indicates the abundance of food and goodness that the single woman will see in her life. God willing. And the unmarried girl who saw that the dead man was alive and gave him much of what he wanted. The meaning here indicates the goodness, livelihood and permanent work that this unmarried woman will have in her life. See also: Interpretation of a dream about the dead returning to life for single people. Interpretation of seeing the dead alive in a dream for a married woman if The married woman saw that the deceased was alive and stayed with her in her home. This is an indication that she will obtain abundant goodness and great sustenance without fatigue or misery in her life, God willing. If a married woman sees in a dream that the deceased is alive and was very sad in the dream. This is an indication of the place of evil. In which this dead man lives, and the dreamer must give him alms. Likewise, a married woman dreams that she sees the dead person alive and asks him for food in the dream. It indicates his request for alms from them and a special invitation to life. Seeing that a married woman sees in a dream the dead person while he is alive. Alive, and he was very sad for her. This is an indication that there are no good things that this married woman will see in her life, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of seeing a dead person alive in a dream for a divorced woman. A divorced woman also saw in a dream that the dead person was alive and asked her about Al-Fatihah in a dream. On A divorced woman can read the Holy Qur’an to the soul of the dead person whom she saw in a dream. A divorced woman who saw that the dead person was alive rejoiced greatly in the dream. It announces the great and good position he was in in the afterlife, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Either a divorced woman sees in a dream that she is looking at the dead. And she was crying in the dream and was very sad. This is an indication that there are no good things that this divorced woman will see in her life, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. And if the divorced woman appears in the dream that she is searching for the dead person while he is alive in order to support and help him. This indicates that he will be sad in the dream. This time, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Read also: Interpretation of the chest of a dead person in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a dead person alive in a man’s dream and its meaning. If the dreamer sees in a dream that the deceased is alive and sitting with him in the dream. Here it shows the sad things that a man suffers from in life. He will get rid of it soon, God willing. title: Complete information about the interpretation of a dream about drinking juice in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of drinking juice in a dream: Drinking juice is one of the things that must be maintained properly, because it has many benefits for the body. Interpretation of the dream of drinking juice in a dream: To find out whether it has the same good meaning in the dream or not. What is the interpretation of the dream of drinking juice in a dream? Which - Seeing yourself drinking juice in a dream shows the goodness and happiness that God has decreed for the dreamer, as he is satisfied with what his Lord has given him, so He provides for him from where he does not expect it. If the dreamer feels some fatigue in his body and sees this vision, then this is evidence of his immediate recovery and escape from this disease without Leaving no trace of him. When drinking juice in a dream and the dreamer is in debt, his vision indicates that he will pay off his debts as a result of an increase in his money in the coming period. We also find that it is good news for the individual about his success and excellence if he is a student, as he occupies a high position among his friends. If the dreamer is poor With money, this vision is good news for him with sustenance that will make him live a better life without the need for anyone else because he becomes very wealthy, which makes him fascinated with all the livelihood that he has found. The vision shows that the dreamer has the quality of generosity and giving to everyone around him, and that he is not stingy with anything he owns, no matter what it is. Precious. If he takes it in a dream from someone, this indicates the luxury that the dreamer experiences, such as the vision confirms that he will soon communicate with a partner who will make him happy in his life, and who will stand by his side in any circumstance he faces. If the dreamer is a student and sees this dream, it means that he has passed He studied it with great distinction and success. The evil part of this vision is that he drinks juices that are not edible or spoiled, so the dream is a sign of harmful problems for him. What is the interpretation of a dream about drinking juice by Ibn Sirin? Ibn Sirin narrated that drinking juice is good news for everyone who dreams of it. The dream also indicates The many gains that the dreamer obtains in his life and these gains make him excel in reaching a prominent position. The dream expresses his release from any distress or distress, and if he is imprisoned, this indicates his release as quickly as possible from his prison. If the fortuneteller pours it on him unintentionally , he has passed an unparalleled and exorbitant wealth. If he pours it on the ground, this means that he will fall into a sad predicament for him, and the vision also shows that he cannot spend his money in the right place, but rather spends it on useless things. But if the dreamer sees that He drinks alcohol, so the vision is evidence of his forbidden life and the many sins he commits in his life just to please himself. Drinking alcohol in a dream indicates countless sins. What is the interpretation of a dream about drinking juice for a single woman? Interpretation of a dream about drinking juice for a single woman - who sees drinking juice in a dream A single woman is clear evidence that she heard happy news and it may indicate that she will be happy with her engagement soon. If she buys it, this indicates her happy marriage at the first opportunity, and if she distributes it to people in her dream, it also means a happy and soon marriage, especially if it tastes sweet. But if If she feels that she has bad taste, this indicates that she is facing problems that make her unhappy in her life, in addition to being exposed to...

title: Interpretation of a dream about putting money in the mosque in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about putting money in the mosque in a dream Some people want to know the interpretation of the dream that you are putting money in the mosque in a dream, and for this you have to be careful and not fully believe in these interpretations. Interpretation of a dream about putting money in a mosque in a dream Seeing money inside a mosque in a dream may indicate the wide sustenance that the dreamer may obtain during this period. If one sees himself putting money in the mosque, this may indicate the blessings and happy events that the dreamer is going through in his life in those days. Putting money in a mosque in a dream may be a sign of the end of the fatigue and sadness that the dreamer suffered from in the previous period, thanks to God. If one sees himself putting money inside the mosque, this may be a sign of the financial situation and the wide satisfaction that the dreamer can gain during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about putting cat food in a dream If one sees that he was putting cat food in a dream, this may indicate that he is a very strong personality, thanks to God. If you see cat food in a dream, this may indicate that the dreamer bears responsibility and performs his duties to the fullest during those days. Seeing cat food in a dream may indicate the family stability that the dreamer enjoyed at that time, God willing I know. The dream of putting cat food in a dream may indicate the happiness and peace that the dreamer enjoyed in his life during this time, and God knows best. The dream of giving birth to a male child in a dream can indicate the success that the dreamer can achieve during these days. If one sees the birth of a child in a dream, this may indicate the happiness and joy that one will receive in those days, and God knows best. If one sees the birth of a male child in a dream, this may indicate success in work, livelihood, and expansion for them during this period. And God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about putting on dentures in a dream Wearing dentures in a dream may indicate that the dreamer is going through a crisis that he may suffer from for some time, and God knows best. If a person sees that he is putting on dentures in a dream, this may indicate the huge source of livelihood that the dreamer can obtain in his life in those days. It is possible that the dream of wearing dentures in a dream indicates naked changes that may occur to the dreamer in those days, and God knows best. If a person sees wearing dentures in a dream, this may indicate the experience that the dreamer will face and that he will soon be freed from it, God willing. title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a crutch in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: The dreamer's crutch reflects many associations, perhaps good and perhaps bad. In another interpretation, seeing a crutch is weak and bad, as Ibn Sirin and Imam Nabulsi explained that a crutch in a person’s dream is support, control, and a good feeling, but there are places where seeing a crutch cannot be. He praised and praised. Dead or falling after performing and in this article everything related to seeing a crutch in a dream in detail. Interpretation of seeing a crutch in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin interpreted the crutch in a dream of a dead person as evidence of improving the dreamer’s circumstances for the better. Seeing a broken crutch in a dream indicates fears and problems in life Seeing a healthy crutch in a dream is a sign of safety, comfort, and peace. Relying on crutches in a dream is evidence that the patient will recover in the near future and achieve good health. Seeing an iron crutch in a dream is evidence of the dreamer’s great kindness and coming. Seeing a wooden crutch in a dream means that the dreamer He wants to help others. Interpretation of seeing a crutch in a dream for a married woman: Seeing a married woman on a crutch in a dream indicates her great love for her husband. The crutch in a married dream also indicates a happy life with her husband. Breaking a pillar in a married woman’s dream is evidence that you are facing many marital disputes. Which causes separation. Seeing iron cocks in a married woman’s dream is a sign of kindness. Interpretation of a crutch in a dream for a pregnant woman. Dreaming of a pregnant woman carrying a crutch is a sign that childbirth is approaching and she will give birth in good health. Leaning on crutches in a dream indicates the birth of a boy. It also indicates the loss of the crutch In a dream, it is evidence of exposure to problems and difficulties. Interpretation of seeing a crutch in a dream for a single woman: Seeing a crutch in your dream is a sign of the good luck that you will obtain. Seeing single people on a crutch in a dream is evidence of the imminent marriage of a person with good morals. A crutch in a girl’s dream also indicates On kindness. Breaking a crutch when a woman fails is evidence of her participation in involvement and falling into problems. Seeing a crutch in a dream about dead people. Seeing a crutch in a dream about dead people indicates good deeds in life and a good reputation. A healthy crutch in a dream indicates good morals and perhaps a good ending for the dead person. A broken crutch indicates bad deeds, big problems, and fears. Seeing a crutch in a dream indicates great stability and security that the dreamer desires. A wooden crutch in a dream is nothing but a feeling of loneliness, negative feelings, and a great desire for help and assistance from others. Seeing a crutch in a sick dream can be He sees himself leaning on a crutch, and this is one of the most praiseworthy visions that reflects complete recovery by God’s will. An iron crutch is a source of good and abundant livelihood. Leaning on a crutch in a sick person’s dream is good news and happiness for her and her family. Other interpretations of seeing a crutch in a dreamIf the sleeper sees himself in Dreaming as if he is suffering from an obstacle or standing and may be suffering from a crutch, this indicates a feeling of loneliness and a desire to help others, and this vision may be formed as a result of his fear of being...

title: A detailed interpretation of a dress in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: In the following paragraphs, we present to you the interpretation of a dress in a dream for an unmarried woman, according to the interpretation of the great scholar Muhammad ibn Sirin. Interpretation scholars have many clues about this dream, and that is why we will show you in the following article from the encyclopedia the most prominent offers of scholars and jurists in interpreting this dream for an unmarried girl. Interpretation of a dress in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of a dress in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The respected scholar Ibn Sirin believes that the meaning of a dress in a dream varies. Depending on its color, if a girl sees in her dream that she is wearing a white dress, then this vision shows the approach of someone preparing for her engagement. A religious and moral man, and he will treat her with generosity. Seeing a blue dress in a girl’s dream indicates the date of her marriage to a very rich and wealthy man. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is wearing a red dress, then this vision indicates her marriage to a man who was married before her. Seeing a black dress in The dream of an unmarried girl indicates her marriage to a poor man who is suffering from financial problems. Interpretation of searching for clothes for singles. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is searching for a dress and does not find it, then this vision indicates that the girl is suffering from failure in her life and her inability to achieve things. That she is looking for. If a girl is looking for a wedding dress on her wedding night and feels confused about choosing the dress, then this vision suggests that she is suffering from distraction and an inability to make a decision. Interpretation of a dream about wearing a short dress for a single woman. Dream interpretation scholars say that if she sees an unmarried girl In her dream that she is wearing a short dress, this vision indicates the emergence of problems and crises that the girl will have difficulty coping with. If an unmarried girl sees that she is wearing a short green dress, this is a good vision that promises her to make fateful and important decisions that will improve her situation. If the girl is already engaged and dreams of wearing her engagement dress, then this vision indicates that she will get married soon. Scientists say that seeing a green engagement dress in a girl’s dream Unmarried indicates her engagement to a good man. This vision may indicate the appearance of happy events in this girl’s life, such as academic excellence or a promotion at work. Lawyers believe that this vision may be the result of the girl thinking a lot about the date of her engagement, and sometimes the dreams that the person sees are In a dream, it is a reflection of thoughts in his subconscious mind. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is wearing a dress that has an attractive appearance and is pink in color, then this vision shows the girl’s feeling of love towards another person and shows the presence of tender and romantic feelings in the girl’s heart. title: Giving coins in a dream and the interpretation of seeing a dead person giving coins

preview.html: Interpretation of presenting coins in a dream: There is a large group of interpretations that referred to coins, which differed depending on what was mentioned in the dream. Married and pregnant women? Interpretation of giving money in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of giving coins in a dream. A large number of experts believe that if you find someone giving you coins in your dream, the vision is a bad omen for you and its consequences are difficult, as it portends the difficulty of achieving dreams, and the person may feel that financial circumstances Very tight. While taking this money from an unmarried woman, he warns her of the multiplication of worries and responsibilities in her life and the increase of these pressures on her, and God knows best. And since when you give metal money to someone, experts confirm that you will be freed from sorrows and worries, in addition to the happiness and financial prosperity that you will achieve, with permission. God. Most experts believe that giving these coins to a pregnant woman indicates her many problems, the many difficult things to move around, and the many pains she faces. Interpretation of giving money in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin is considered one of the scholars who believe that giving money is not a good thing in the world of dreams. As for the husband giving it to his partner, this indicates the responsibilities that he constantly bears on her and causes her a lot of pressure and can prove their ongoing differences. As for the fiancé giving it to his fiancée in the vision, it is an unfavorable sign of this relationship due to the many personal differences between them, and this may threaten separation. While the person who has been given one of these chapters, life becomes calmer for him, he enjoys righteousness, joy and happiness prevail and is present. A specialized Egyptian website that includes a team of the best dream and vision interpreters in the Arab world. To access it, type the Egyptian dream interpretation site in Google.Interpretation of giving coins in a dream to a single womanMost interpreters confirm that giving money to a girl in a vision is not a pleasant thing because it leads to problems in her life and increases the depth of differences, which are often with people close to her If a friend gives her this coin, she should think about this company because she is an inappropriate person and has feelings of hatred and resentment towards her and does not fear for her. If any colleague at work gives it to her, he will feel hatred and hatred towards her as a result of her success and superiority, and he may make her make some mistakes at work. To cause her problems. And if she saw her friend or fiancé giving it to her and taking it from him, it is possible that she will break up with him, given the many disagreements and many mistakes in this relationship. A large number of experts say that giving a woman these coins is good news for her because she will have a good opportunity to Life, and she will enjoy happiness and will not feel weak or sad. There is a group of commentators who explain that whoever gave her this money is talking bad about her, and ruining her reputation behind her back, and God knows best. Interpretation of giving coins in a dream to a married woman: pouring

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing the Messenger from afar in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about seeing the Messenger from afar in a dream. If you want to know the interpretations of scholars about the interpretation of a dream about seeing the Messenger from afar in a dream, we will learn about all this and more in the following lines. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the Messenger from afar in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing the Messenger from afar in a dream. We did not find Clear interpretations of seeing the Messenger from afar. However, seeing the Messenger in a dream could be a sign of goodness, and God knows best. When you see the Messenger, he said, this indicates joy and happiness, God willing. If the dreamer sees the Prophet frowning, this may indicate anxiety, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of the dream of seeing the Messenger’s daughters in a dream. Interpretation The dream of seeing the Prophet’s daughters in a dream could lead to marrying a righteous woman, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees the Prophet’s daughters, it may indicate a righteous woman, and God knows best. If a married woman sees Fatima al-Zahra in a dream, this may be evidence of a person’s loss, and God knows the unseen. As some have mentioned, it could be It expresses goodness and happiness, God willing. Interpretation of a dream of hearing the voice of the Prophet Muhammad in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of hearing the voice of the Prophet Muhammad in a dream could be a reference to good news, and God knows the unseen. It can express receiving happy news, and God knows best. If the dreamer hears the voice of the Messenger, may God bless him and grant him peace, perhaps It is a sign of his repentance for sins, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. It can also indicate goodness and happiness, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about hearing the sound of the Qur’an in the bathroom in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about hearing the sound of the Qur’an in the bathroom in a dream could indicate hypocrites, and God knows the unseen. And because it may express the betrayal of some Hypocrites, God is also higher and more knowledgeable. When a single girl sees herself hearing the sound of the Qur’an in the bathroom, it could indicate problems and difficulties, and God knows the unseen. If a married woman sees herself hearing the sound of the Qur’an in a dream, this may be evidence of disagreements, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream of not being able to Hearing the Qur’an in a dream Interpretation of a dream about not being able to hear the Qur’an in a dream. Not being able to read the Qur’an may indicate that you are listening to songs, and God knows the unseen. Seeing the inability to read the Qur’an can also express difficult problems, and God knows the unseen. When an unmarried girl sees her inability to read the Qur’an, this may lead to her turning away from God and she must return. God is Most High and Most Knowing.Interpretation of a dream about difficulty memorizing the Qur’an in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about difficulty memorizing the Qur’an in a dream Difficulty reading the Qur’an can be interpreted as turning away from God and must return, and God knows the unseen.If a married woman finds difficulty in memorizing the Qur’an, this indicates indulging in lust, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees difficulty in reciting the Qur’an, it may be a sign of committing sins, and God knows the unseen. Also, seeing difficulty in reciting the Qur’an may indicate pleasure, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Interpretation of a dream of hearing the Qur’an from someone I know in a dream. Interpretation of a dream of hearing the Qur’an from someone I know in a dream could be evidence. On the justice he enjoys, and God knows best

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about worms in the hair of a married woman according to Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Seeing worms in reality causes panic and fear, so seeing them in a dream is a warning of something to the viewer, and the interpretation varies according to the circumstances of the realistic viewer, regardless of the details of the dream itself, such as the shape. And the size of the worm, and let us discuss it today. Interpretation of a dream about worms in a married woman’s hair. Interpretation of a dream about worms in a married woman’s hair according to Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about worms in a married woman’s hair? The more worms on a married woman’s head indicates that she will obtain a lot of legitimate money in addition to her higher status. Social status will improve significantly, and if she is looking for work to help her husband, she will do so. Be able to obtain it. If the dreamer is barren, then seeing worms in her hair in a dream is good news and strong evidence that God (Glory be to Him) will provide her with good offspring. If someone suffers from unhappiness in her married life due to endless disagreements, the dream It indicates that all these differences will end and that happiness will fill her life. Ibn Shaheen says that the large number of worms in a married woman’s hair indicates that she is busy all the time and does not ask about her family or friends due to the many responsibilities that fall on her. The dream also indicates that she will undergo a series of radical changes. In her life, but unfortunately these changes are for the worse and not for the better. If a married woman sees that she can remove worms from her hair, this indicates that she will be able to solve all the problems she faces in her life, in addition to the goodness and livelihood that will dominate her life. Interpretation of a dream about worms In the hair of a married woman by Ibn Sirin: If a pregnant woman sees many worms in her hair, this indicates that the days of her pregnancy will go well and that all good things are on their way. Small worms in the hair of a married woman indicate that she does not enjoy peace and comfort in her life due to the many responsibilities that she has. It is her responsibility, in addition to the fact that her husband never provides for her. Worms coming out of a married woman's hair indicate that she will be able to get rid of all her problems and all the things that cause her discomfort. The demands of his children. The dream is an indication of abundant livelihood and freedom from poverty. Also, one of the good interpretations of seeing worms is that there are people around the woman who are trying to harm her, but she will be able to discover their truth early. In the event that she sees worms in the hair of a married woman and they cause severe itching in her head The dream warns her of the problems and arguments that will arise between her and her husband in the coming days, and it is important for the dreamer to be wise and rational so as not to aggravate the situation between them. The worms that come out of the hair often indicate that the married woman is the subject of envy from those around her, and the reason behind this is that she Do not hide her household affairs from them. The dream also suggests that the dreamer is on her way to eat an orphan’s money or bear false witness about someone, and her testimony will lead to great injustice to that person. Seeing worms coming out of the hair and starting to walk all over the body is an indication

Seeing worms coming out of the hair and starting to walk all over the body is an indication

title: Interpretation of seeing snakes in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: In the following article, we present to you, dear reader, the consequences of seeing snakes in a dream, according to what dream interpretation scholars say. They are like dreams that cause suffering to those who see them and wake them up. In a state of fear and panic, he prayed to God that this dream does not include anything evil or evil, he or any of his family members. Snakes are considered poisonous reptiles that live in the desert and rural areas, but they rarely penetrate cities and urban areas, and their bite leads to Severe poisoning. Then it stings its fist with its poison or eats it. We met in an encyclopedia about interpretations of different cases of seeing snakes in a dream. Seeing snakes in a dream The great scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin says to see a snake in a dream the following interpretations: Whoever eats snake meat in a dream will gain prestige, money, and power. The white snake is a difficult opponent, but the black snake is an extremely harmful opponent. Whoever sees that the snake speaks to him kindly, this indicates people’s admiration for his words and calmness. The snake entering the house symbolizes harm and misfortunes for the pioneer regarding his home and family, God forbid. Whoever sees a snake entering and leaving his house, and the matter is repeated, this indicates that His enemy is among his family. The snake falling from above and dying indicates the loss of a job or position for the fortuneteller. Seeing a snake coming out of the ground indicates a misfortune that will happen in that place. The snake coming out of the stomach symbolizes harm to relatives. It is a good vision to watch snakes roaming in the orchard because It symbolizes the growth of the garden and the growth of its flowers. Fighting a snake in a dream indicates resistance to a cunning enemy in the dreamer’s life. If he kills it, he will be victorious over him and his bad goals, but if he does not kill it and one of them rises, he will suffer damage from his enemy, calculated by the size of the snake he saw, and God Almighty knows best. A snake in a dream for a single woman. In the following points we mention the interpretation of seeing snakes in a dream for a single woman: Seeing a snake trying to approach and bite it indicates calamity and trouble, but saving her from it by escaping or killing symbolizes her salvation by the command of God Almighty. If an unmarried woman walks and accompanies a snake in a dream without Fear of him indicates the presence of a malicious and cunning person in a relationship with her who deceives her that he is a good person but in reality he is evil, so you should beware of him and stay away from him. Seeing a white snake hatching and turning white is a good vision that indicates her marriage soon and the birth of good offspring. Carrying a white snake in the hand Then putting it in the bag indicates an abundance of sustenance for unmarried women in the coming period or a prestigious job. Interpretation of seeing a large snake in a dream Seeing a large snake in a dream indicates the extent of hostility that arises between the dreamer and his family and relatives. It may indicate the presence of people who envy the dreamer, envy him, and wish for him. Also harm. Whoever sees that a great snake swallows him will gain glory and honor. Seeing a great snake raised by some god and that this place is swollen means abundant food, as the poison indicates money, and the swelling indicates abundance and increase. Seeing small snakes in a dream is presented to you in the following paragraph Meanings of seeing small snakes in a dream: It symbolizes...
